conservative.name: Cantrip
conservative.requirements: 1 power. May require a prop, manoeuvre, or other requirement at the GM’s discretion
conservative.uniqueEffect:
Effect: You create a small magical effect so trivial as to be almost effortless. You might conjure a light or flame about equivalent to a lit candle, move an object about the size of a wine glass a few feet, briefly change the colour of your eyes, move a coin from one hand to another, or perform other tricks and tasks appropriate to your Order.

Cantrip is unable to cause damage, duplicate the effects of a manoeuvre or action card, or inflict stress or fatigue. If the GM agrees, you may use Cantrip similarly to the Perform a Stunt action to make a Spellcraft (Int) check and generate a minor magical effect not covered by the rules. The GM will set the difficulty and determine the results, which may include influencing a target or other effects
